title: S1 Ep7: What is holding firms back?
itunes:title: What is holding firms back?
description:
Chris Woodruff discusses the role management practices play in firm growth. Further, he explores different mechanisms for improving firm management in varying contexts across developing countries.

This [VoxDev Talk](https://voxdev.org/topic/firms-trade/what-holding-firms-back-0) is taken from a video that first appeared on [the IGC's](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q6bzeRAvKYo) website.

Chris Woodruff discusses the role management practices play in firm growth. Further, he explores different mechanisms for improving firm management in varying contexts across developing countries.
